description: A piece of a giant insect's exoskeleton.  It is very light and very durable.
A lump of exoskeleton from a giant insect that has undergone biosilicification.  It is acid-resistant but rather brittle.
A multi-inch venemous fang from some horrid insect.  Makes a poor melee weapon.
A fragile, slightly quivering organ for the production and storage of arachnid venom.  You could maybe make use of the venom inside, but only if you hurry.

A high-quality lens, made out of some otherworldy material.  Looking through it causes a spike of anxiety, and you swear you can see something watching you back that's not there to your normal vision.
A very tough sinew cut from a muscled corpse, usable as a strong thread.
//: 30 meters of thread per 1g, roughly 6 inches of thread per unit.

description: A steel thread like sinew cut from an extremely muscled corpse, usable as uniquely tough thread.
//: 30 meters of thread per 1g, roughly 6 inches of thread per unit.
Materials for use when creating monster crafts out of tougher materials. 10 inches of brute or hulk sinew.

description: A large bladed arm of a mutant mantis, maybe you could make a sword with it?
A large bladed arm of a mutant mantis, maybe you could make a sword with it?
Blood from a mutant creature. It writhes as you look at it, seeking to change even now. Maybe you could use that property in something?

use_action.activation_message: You choke down the disgusting, writhing liquid.

description: Blood from a dangerous mutant creature. It changes as you watch it, and could probably impart that property on something if used right.

use_action.activation_message: You choke down the disgusting, writhing liquid.

description: Blood from a powerful mutant creature. It constantly shifts and churns - you could use it to make a powerful change in something.

use_action.activation_message: You choke down the disgusting, writhing liquid.

//: Materials for use when applying basic change to monster crafts. Mutant blood, less needed for more potent versions.
Materials for use when applying moderate change to monster crafts. Mutant blood, less needed for more potent versions.
Materials for use when applying advanced change to monster crafts. Mutant blood.

description: You're mostly certain this exists. Its hard to put a finger on any real qualities of it, but you can probably use it for something, right?
Okay, you're almost certain this one is real. Its... more than a probably something, and you think you could do better things with it.
This; You don't know what it is, but it is definately the best of its kind. Could be used to do extraordinary things.

//: Materials for use when applying esoteric changes to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.
Materials for use when applying esoteric changes to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.
Materials for use when applying esoteric changes to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.

description: A strange gland from a large insect, this explains how these insects can break the square cubed law. Could be used to add strength or power to a monster craft.
A strange gland from a huge insect, this explains how these insects can break the square cubed law. Could be used to add strength or power to a monster craft.
A strange gland from a truly gargantuan insect, this explains how these insects can break the square cubed law. Could be used to add strength or power to a monster craft.

//: Materials for use when applying strength or power improvements to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.
Materials for use when applying strength or power improvements to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.
Materials for use when applying strength or power improvements to monster crafts, can substitute a higher level one for a lower level.
